## AbstractResponseBuilder.withSuggestions() method

Provide suggestions for the user.

Limited support across platforms for this at the moment, only Google Assistant.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract withSuggestions(suggestion: SuggestionTypes | SuggestionTypes[], append?: boolean): AbstractResponseBuilder<R>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  suggestion | [SuggestionTypes](./stentor-models.suggestiontypes.md) \| [SuggestionTypes](./stentor-models.suggestiontypes.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Either a single suggestion chip or an array |
|  append | boolean |  |

[AbstractResponseBuilder](./stentor-models.abstractresponsebuilder.md)<!-- -->&lt;R&gt;

The builder instance
